title: Strokes Of Midnight
description: Warning: Graphic sexual scenes Hank is hunting the wants ads, looking for that elusive dominatrix who could possibly bring him out of his shell and into the world he desires. Wanda is worried that being a weekend sex slave may change her life forever. The deviant things she has to do to please her two masters! Peter is the quintessential ‛pick up artist’. Does a lady dare to have him buy her a drink? Melinda is caught in the nude watching the muscular roofer next door. He comes a knockin’ for that proverbial ‛may I have a glass of water’….
author: Mallory West
